title: How to write a two-paragraph essay - Quora

response.answer_text: A two-paragraph essay is a piece of writing that involves a brief discussion of a subject. This essay is so brief that it has only the introduction and the conclusion. You don’t get the opportunity to explore the topic properly, unlike other forms of writing. So, you need to start writing with a specific plan of action. When writing a two-paragraph essay, there are a few things you need to bear in mind: The content must be lean and straightforward – no space for beating about the bush.The body section should be incorporated into the introduction.The introduction should not exceed 2-3 sentences.The thesis statement should be specific to the essay’s direction.Create a draft first and wean the unnecessary parts for more clarityYou can omit topic sentences since every paragraph is dedicated to particular topics.Use transition words to create a seamless flow of ideas within the paragraph.Summarize the main points in the conclusion sectionAlso, the paragraphs don’t necessarily have to be of equal size. The conclusion paragraph can feature fewer sentences than the introductory paragraph. Remember to keep it concise when writing a two-paragraph essay. Review the final draft and fix all grammar, punctuation, and spelling errors.
